title: Exam Preparation App: Free Mock Test, Live Classes
description:
Download Gradeup app
to prepare for 100+ Exams with Free LIVE Learning classes, mock test papers, daily current affairs & daily GK, daily quizzes, previous year solved papers, unlimited practice questions, exam notifications, recorded video classes, resolve your doubts, exam test series, online coaching & much more 💯
Gradeup is India’s BEST Exam Preparation App for various competitive exams:
•
Government job, RRB, SSC exam prep app:
SSC CGL, SSC CHSL, SSC MTS, RRB JE, ALP, etc in English & Hindi
•
Bank & Insurance exam prep app:
SBI PO and Clerk, IBPS PO, RBI, LIC AAO, NICL, etc
•
Teaching exam prep app:
CTET, KVS, UPTET etc in english & hindi
•
UPSC & State Services, DEFENCE exams prep:
UPSC, EPFO, MPPSC, CDS, NDA etc
•
GATE entrance exam preparation:
GATE CE, ME, EE, CS, ECE etc
•
CLAT, NTA UGC NET & JRF exams
, CAT & MBA other entrance exams
👉
Why Gradeup is #1 Online Exam Preparation App
✔  LIVE Online Classes by India’s top teachers
✔  Unlimited practice questions, quizzes
✔ Exam focussed study material & notes
✔ Previous year solved papers & question papers
✔ FREE video series (in LIVE & recorded format)
✔ Latest exam notifications & Sarkari job alerts
✔ Doubts solving by peers & mentors
✔ Prepare in Hindi & English with Night Mode option
►
#1 SARKARI JOB PREPARATION APP
SSC 2020 exams online coaching with the best SSC exam preparation app - SSC CGL, SSC MTS, SSC CHSL, CPO, RRB JE, RRB ALP, RRB NTPC, RRB Group D, SSC JE & steno with free mock tests, SSC online classes, SSC test series, practise previous year papers. Stay updated with latest SSC notifications with daily current affairs & GK quizzes etc.
►
START ONLINE BANK EXAMS PREPARATION 2020
Best IBPS PO, IBPS Clerk, SBI PO, SBI Clerk, RBI Assistant, RBI grade B, Insurance exam preparation: LIC AAO, ADO, NICL AO, UIIC AO etc. with free mock tests, study online in LIVE classes, solve last 5+ year previous year solved papers, daily current affairs 2020, GK quizzes, attempt topic wise practice quizzes. IBPS guide has PO, clerk mock tests to help score better.
►
CRACK TEACHING ENTRANCE & RECRUITMENT EXAMS 2020
Free CTET, KVS, UPTET, DSSSB, army recruitment and other TET question papers, previous year solved papers, live online classes, best test series, mock tests to build your accuracy. All the preparation & study material in CTET preparation app in hindi & english.
►
GATE 2021 EXAM PREPARATION
GATE online coaching for Mechanical Engineering (ME), Civil(CE), Computer Science(CS), Electrical(EE), Electronics(EC) with latest pattern GATE test series, GATE previous year papers, practice question papers. GATE online LIVE learning classes by the best faculty. Prepare for other exams - IES, BARC, DMRC etc.
►
UPSC, DEFENCE & STATE SERVICES PREPARATION APP
A complete package of UPSC online coaching - with free mock tests, attend LIVE Classes from ex-IAS/UPSC qualified teachers. Get UPSC previous year solved question papers. It is the best CDS exam preparation app offline & online with CDS, NDA, with LIVE classes, videos, previous year paper with solutions. Get daily current affairs, notes, quizzes for best preparation.
►
NTA UGC NET,CLAT ENTRANCE EXAM PREPARATION APP
UGC NET LIVE Classes, previous year papers, test series, study material etc all in one app both online & offline. Latest pattern mock tests for CLAT, AILET, SLAT, and MAH-CET etc, Free LIVE classes, CLAT previous year solved papers with daily current affairs, GK and quizzes. Apart from this, prepare for other entrance exams like CAT, NMAT, CMAT, etc.
🔥
Highlights
🔥
• Gradeup Classroom offers LIVE Learning & Online Coaching options by the famous subject experts
•Gradeup Greencard offers unlimited practice mock tests.
Gradeup App is free to download and there are no ads. A subset of the features are free forever, but premium courses are only available through additional purchases.
